1.content:
You wake up in your "Room" to the sound of excited, and giant, children running around. To be fair, if the walls weren't made of cardboard you'd probably still be able to sleep.

The roof of the shoebox that they gave you for a room is lifted as the Orphanage owner looks down on you.

"Get up. Someone wants to adopt you."

Wait, seriously? Your finally getting out of here! The owner not-so-gently picks you up and brings you into an office.

This is great this is amazing...Wait WHAT?

You are shocked to see...
1.title: Adoption Day

choices: Opal takes you straight to her house and gets you sorted for living with her.
Before going home, Opal decides to visit Destiny who may or may not be at work.
She stops by her sister Petra for a Visit
She brings you to a beach (Visiting Roxy)
Visits one of the other sisters/ Reader's choice
11.content:
A purple gargoyle sitting on a chair, quite uncomfortably, due to her wings being pushed into her back. This monster is Opal, your social worker, who was tasked with making sure you were taken care of while in the orphanage. On the days that she sees you, she would wear a red pantsuit and horn-rimmed glasses. She was also what a person would call 'a bit on the pudgy side,' but that didn't really matter to you, since she wasn't wearing but a simple dress and ordinary glasses in the office today. This could only mean one thing: she was the one that was adopting YOU. At first you are surprised, but that soon leaves and is replaced with...hope maybe?
         The silence must have been too much for the owner, because he says "ahem," rather roughly, this brings you both back to the present and then you two look at him. "Look I have some stuff to do alright, so the sooner we're done here, the quicker I can't get them done." The owner's tone and gestures he makes while saying this seems to annoy Opal a bit, since she stares at him intensely but she quickly regains her composure and replies, "you're right, let's move on." "Thank you," answers the owner.
         You watch as Opal signs some papers, as well as handing over some money to the owner. After this is done, you are handed over to her, she carefully places you between her cleavage. Then she proceeds to exit the building and as soon as the both of you are outside, Opal spreads her wings wide and says to you with care and concern, "hold on Timmy, you'll be at your new home soon." You clasp the front of her dress and hold on with all your strength as she takes off and starts to fly away. However, you ask in your mind 'where exactly is home?'
11.title: Opal, your Purple Gargoyle social worker

choices: Your in a small house
Your at a beach
12.content:
A werewolf. The Orphanage owner is giving you to a werewolf.

Werewolves are infamously predators, to the point where in the middle ages it was believed that they ONLY ate humans. You starting sweating profusely, terrified. The owner is selling you to someone who is more than likely just going to gulp you down the minute she leaves the building.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------
Diane bounced in the waiting room chair. She couldn't believe she finally found a place that would sell her a human. She'd wanted a pet human since she was a kid! Granted her cousins probably would of eaten it she had it then.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------
The owner slowly hands you over to the grinning grey colossus. and you look into the eyes of the Predator that you've been sold to and feel despair fill you every fiber. Those eyes, those eyes twinkle with some kind of cruel glee. This wolf has no intent of being kind to you.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------
Oh my god its adorable. Diane stared down at the human child. Cant let the owner know I think that though, he'll jack up the price. She quite calmly and quickly put the human in her purse and handed the owner a small wad of cash.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------
You don't know how long you've been in the purse. It's dark in the purse and when the purse opened you're eyes slowly begin changing to the light. You take a look around your new surroundings...
12.title: Diane's new pet.

14.content:
Nefernina-Su-Ancknamun's: 800ft pear shaped mummy girl wrapped in gauze up to her neck. She hates humans, and views them as nothing more than pests. Whatever her reasoning for adopting a young human is, little Timmy definitely won't have a good time with her...

Chel Sherpa: 450ft yeti girl with a heart of gold. She would never intentionally harm Timmy, and only wants what's best for him. She works as a nurse. Timmy would be very well off with her

Lupa Howler: 550ft obese werewolf girl, and a known human eater. Since the orphanage owner couldn't care less about Timmy's well being, she's ready to give him to this obese werewolf, who will inevitably eat him.

141.content:
The biggest monster you've EVER seen. Most tap out at about 400 feet but this one looks like she's about twice that.

A mummy? You might have lucked out! Mummies used to be human and most tend to be sympathetic towards other humans.

Nefernina hands the owner a stack of cash and picks you up before walking towards the door. She gives you a look filled with an emotion you can't identify before the shoves you in a back pocket

Maybe you weren't so lucky. What was that look about...
141.title: Are you My Mummy?

144.content:
Azure Skinwalker: 700ft heavyset silver furred werecoyote woman. She has a white crescent moon shaped birthmark in the center of her face, which is really noticable. Since Azure has thick fur over her body, she wears nothing except for a white polo shirt with light grey pants. She also owns a ski resort and motel called Grimmsly Lodge, in the snowy mountainside near Terrordale. Despite her species being known to eat humans like Tommy, she is actually harmless and is married to a human man named Vernon, and has adopted a werejaguar monster girl named Felicia as her daughter. This means that Azure knows how to raise children and might be able to do so with Tommy, even though he is a human.


Dinah Vile: 900ft werecroc monster girl with an enormous hourglass figure. She has blue scales with a yellow underbelly and blonde hair that reaches to her backside. Dinah works as a waitress in Grimmsly Lodge that is owned by Azure Skinwalker. Dinah has an apparent obsessive crush on a certain human boy that works at the same place she does, so she wears a skimpy waitress outfit and may wear skimpy clothing as well. Whether she eats humans or not is unclear. However, since she is in love with a human boy, Tommy might be okay. She might be adopting him to get the attention of the human boy she adores (and stalks frequently.)
144.title: Special appearances from Monster Slopes

You both arrive at Grimmsly Lodge
1441.content:
In Azure's POV:

You are waiting in the office while taking in your surroundings. This place isn't that bad, you think to yourself. Still...I don't think any human, let alone A CHILD should stay here! Your sensitive coyote hearing picks up heavy footsteps down the hall, as well as a small childlike voice asking "who is it?" over and over again at the owner. Apparently, the director is getting annoyed, but eventually calms down when he enters his office and reveals the small human boy in his hand to Mrs. Skinwalker.

In Tommy's POV:

You stare back at the giantess with pure horror. A werecoyote! Like werewolves, this species is known to hunt humans as well. Getting a better look, you notice that she is covered in thick silver fur; appears to have a heavyset build and is wearing nothing but a white polo shirt with light grey pants. However, what was even more striking was the white crescent moon shaped birthmark in the centre of her head. Apparently the female werecoyote notices you staring at her birthmark and smiles warmly back at you. Later she asks in a motherly tone (to your surprise) "Hello there my name is Azure...what is yours?" Trying to answer, you simply stammer "T-Tommy." Azure simply smiles and replies "what a lovely name..." A cough from the director brings you both back to the present. "Oh right," Azure gives an apologetic look to the director. Pretty soon, you see Azure sign some documents and handing over a wad of cash to the director. Afterwards, you are placed in between her cleavage, which you soon find to be nice and soft, thanks to her fur. It's not soon you find yourself falling asleep, while Azure looks down on you with paternal love and a nice smile.

In Azure's POV:

You get in your...vehicle, which is a cross between a gigantic snowmobile and jeep. As your driving to your lodge, you can hardly wait to show the newest member to the Skinwalker family. As you're driving you think to yourself this will be a nice surprise to everyone...
1441.title: Azure Skinwalker

choices: It's Felicia Skinwalker; the adopted daughter of Vernon and Avery
It's his wife, Avery; who has returned from the orphanage
14411.content: In a snowy mountainside near Terrordale; a well built, middle aged man with greying hair and wearing a red lumberjack's shirt and snow pants, is patiently waiting for his monster wife, Avery Skinwalker; whom he has been happily married to for 25 years. His name is Vernon Skinwalker and he is currently acting as manager for her while Avery is away. They both own a popular ski resort for various monsters and other supernatural phenomena called "Grimmsly Lodge." As of right now, Vernon is on a gigantic desk in Avery's office; who recently conversed with a few employees that work for the happily married couple. The conversation is mostly filled with questions that have to do with Avery's whereabouts, which is quite agitating for Vernon; yet he secretly agrees with them, since he is usually the assistant to the his spouse. Not today, since he has now temporarily taken his wife's position as manager, who is out on an important errand and won't be back for awhile. After a few hours have passed, Vernon is looking through the humongous window in the manager's office, until he hears the door opening and sees a giant shadow cover him entirely, sighing deeply, the human man turns around to face whoever has come inside to see him...
14411.title: Meanwhile at Grimmsly Lodge...

info.brief_description: A story taking place in the Monster Arms universe (done with permission from JM Darkly)
info.description:
100 gp per good addition

You are Tommy, a human boy who was recently orphaned and is living in an orphanage in the monster world. Unfortunately the monster government doesn't really care all that much about human orphans, so instead of ending up in a safe home you could end up nothing more than someones pet, slave, or snack!!!

MONSTERS

Opal: 450ft Purple Gargoyle social worker. A little on the pudgy side but not exactly obese, wears a red pantsuit and horn-rimmed glasses. Responsible and caring but quite strict. Destiny from Monster Gaols sister. If she ends up adopting Timmy he'll probably be in one of his better situations.

Diane: 400ft Grey furred werewolf. Nice, but a bit of airhead. Cousin of Lupa from Monster Arms. Kind of a hippie, under the impression that humans are helpless, Timmy would definitely end up a pet to this one.

Ying Li: 800ft Obese Pandaren, wears a green chinese dress. Hard to pin down since she doesn't speak much english, seems kinda playful. Rumors imply she does indeed eat humans, but accuracy of that is questionable

More TBA

All monsters are giants. Three hundred feet is the minimum.
Rules
Males Monsters can appear, but only females can interact with or harm Tommy.
No toilet stuff!
No sexual content, the main character is a child and I'm not okay with pedophilia.
Do not use existing characters from anime, cartoon etc. OCs are okay.
Try to keep the monsters adults
Try not to end the story too soon.
Read the previous chapters before you add. I don't want to see anybody using information that is clearly wrong. I had to fix some chapters because some fool wrote things about the characters that contradicted previous information.
You can add more monsters if you want, just try to make them different species than the ones I've put in.
If you come to a type of monster you've never heard of, you can look it up on wikipedia. You might learn something.
Please try to keep this story a fantasy.
